revised_title: Synapsis in Periplaneta: A Study of Chromosome Conjugation and Premeiotic Telophase
tldr: The author examines the process of synapsis, or the pairing of chromosomes, in the insect Periplaneta. They study the premeiotic telophase and its relation to the earlier events of synapsis, providing insights into the meiotic phase in animals. The research also explores the role of plasmosomes in yolk-deposition in insects.
